title: Retirement Advisor: The 8% Rule
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Five years after the enactment of major retirement reform in the UK, the Association of British Insurers presents an evaluation. This podcast (7:05) notes that the reforms were intended to promote “pension freedom,” but the report is now pushing for the use of financial advice to keep people from misusing that freedom.  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
